subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Utter/Ado
msgSnippet: ... Obviously you know way more about it than I do.  I withdraw. -- John Cowan  cowan@ccil.org  http://ccil.org/~cowan If I have not seen as far as others, it
messageBody:
Anthony Grahn scripsit:

> > it's no more complicated than Arabic, after all.
>
> I fear this is not the case:

Obviously you know way more about it than I do. I withdraw.

--
John Cowan cowan@... http://ccil.org/~cowan
If I have not seen as far as others, it is because giants were standing
on my shoulders.
--Hal Abelson
